link.title: HTC
link.script:

li.a: Online Yearbook Ordering Site Reopened until May 1st

ul.li: To schedule an appointment for NYS working papers please email Cwoolheater@htcschools.org

li.a: HTC will be streaming events on Facebook. Please watch the video to set up a Facebook account. Find us on Facebook : Hunter-Tannersville Central School

ul.li: PK/K Screenings scheduled for April 27 & 28 are postponed.

li.a: Executive Order 202.4 Childcare for Essential Personnel Survey
Petitions nominating candidates for the office of member of the Board of Education available
Technology and Youth Protecting Your Child from Electronic Aggression
Utica National's School Safety Excellence Award
